segments.text: Stupid girl , making me spend so much money , now I have to get it from the ATM ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello , welcome to Universal Bank . Please insert your card into the slot .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know where to put my card ! Stupid machine , talking to me like I â€™ m an idiot ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Please input your 6 digit PIN code followed by the pound key . Thank you . Please select an option.Thank you . You have selected withdrawal .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , yeah , I know what I selected . Just give me my money !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Please type the amount you would like to withdraw.Thank you , you want to transfer 10000 USD to the World Wildlife Foundation . If this is correct please press 1 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , no ! Stupid machine , what are you doing ! No !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Confirmed . Thank you for using our bank ! Please remove your card from the slot . Goodbye !
segments.speaker: S2
